content.rendered:
Business Services

Save 15% at Office Depot

Business customers can save 15% at Office Depot! Enroll your Westamerica Business Debit Card and use it when purchasing your supplies online or at any Office Depot store. You’ll save 15% off the retail price of most items!*

How it works

  • Simply complete an enrollment form, and take or mail it to your nearest Westamerica Bank branch. To download enrollment form, click here. Forms are also available at any branch.
  • Once enrolled, use your card for all your online Office Depot purchases or at any Office Depot store.
  • Order online at http://business.officedepot.com. If you provide an e-mail address on the enrollment form, your Login Name and Password will be e-mailed to you after enrollment.
  • When making a purchase at an Office Depot store, be sure to use the credit feature of your card and sign for your purchase in order to take advantage of the discount.

Save when you buy

  • Everyday supplies: paper, pens, pencils, markers, binders and accessories, school supplies, printer and fax accessories, calendars and planners.
  • Office furniture: desks, chairs, file and storage cabinets, lamp.
  • Plus, receive free next-day delivery with all online purchases!

For more information, please call your local Westamerica Bank branch, or (800) 848-1088 from 5am-12am.

* Excluded from the discount are: Gift cards, any technology item (including but not limited to all computers, monitors, televisions, printing machines, networking, peripherals, cameras, memory, software), product protection plans, postage stamps, check printing, custom printing, break room supplies, food and beverage, copy and print services, promotional products, warranties, wireless, satellite, internet technology, installation, and mailing/shipping services from www.techdepot.com, price reductions on clearance items and promotional items, including, but not limited to: Instant Savings, Coupon Savings, Mail-In Savings, and Bundled Savings and any purchase made by contract customers with Store Purchasing or Procurement Cards. 15% discount applies to Office Depot retail store price based on time of purchase, location of product inventory shipment location or pick-up, local market conditions and the competitive environment.Place an order via phone or online by 5:00 p.m. local time, or via fax by 3:00 p.m. local time and your order of $50 or more will be delivered free the next business day between 8:30 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. local time, Monday through Friday, within our local delivery areas. Subject to product availability. Most furniture items excluded. Orders less than $50, furniture, and orders outside our local delivery areas are subject to special handling fees. Full details of Office Depot’s delivery and return policies are located at www.business.officedepot.com Select the link to “Terms and Conditions”. You may also call Customer Service at 888.263.3423 (888-2-OFFICE) or ask a store associate for further assistance.

related resources

  • RemitONE Enrollment
  • Preventing Business Losses
